def: Of or pertaining to meadows; resembling, or consisting of,meadow.

Of or pertaining to money, or consisting of money; pecuniary."The monetary relations of Europe." E. Everett. Monetary unit, thestandard of a national currency, as the dollar in the United States,the pound in England, the franc in France, the mark in Germany.

A genus of plants having a beaklike tours or receptacle, aroundwhich the seed capsules are arranged, and membranous projections, orstipules, at the joints. Most of the species have showy flowers and apungent odor. Called sometimes crane's-bill.
A morbid state produced by the use of iodine and its compounds,and characterized by palpitation, depression, and general emaciation,with a pustular eruption upon the skin.
A kind of overcoat worn upon the shoulders in the manner of acloak. [Scot.]
The state or quality of being clear or bright; brightness;conspicuosness. [R.] Chapman.
